summary: Implements a plugin that reads and writes flight‑track data using a plain‑text representation. It parses text files into internal flight‑track objects, handling unit conversion and thermodynamic calculations, and can serialize flight‑track objects back to text files via a virtual filesystem interface.
business_intent: Allow users of the MSS system to exchange flight‑track information in a simple, human‑readable text format for analysis, reporting, and interoperability with external tools.
